&TERMUX_APP_NAME; requires "Display over other apps" permission to start terminal sessions from background on Android >= 10. Grants it from Settings -> Apps -> &TERMUX_APP_NAME; -> Advanced

&TERMUX_APP_NAME; Preferences for &TERMUX_APP_NAME; app
Debugging Preferences for debugging
Logging
Log Level
Terminal View Key Logging Logs will not have entries for terminal view keys. (Default) Logcat logs will have entries for terminal view keys. These are very verbose and should be disabled under normal circumstances or will cause performance issues.
Plugin Error Notifications Disable flashes and notifications for plugin errors. Show flashes and notifications for plugin errors. (Default)
Crash Report Notifications Disable notifications for crash reports. Show notifications for crash reports. (Default)
Terminal I/O Preferences for terminal I/O
Keyboard
Soft Keyboard Enabled Soft keyboard will be disabled. Soft keyboard will be enabled. (Default)
Soft Keyboard Only If No Hardware Soft keyboard will be enabled even if hardware keyboard is connected. (Default) Soft keyboard will be enabled only if no hardware keyboard is connected.

Need your internal storage permissions!
 The following directory needs to be created on your phone:
 [Internal storage/xinhao/data/] backup package 
 [Internal Storage/xinhao/apk/] Temporary APK 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/windows/]qemu directory 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/command/] command directory 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/font/] font directory 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/iso/] Mirror directory 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/mysql/] MySQL temporary files 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/online_system/] offline termux package 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/qemu/]qemu directory 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/server/]server directory 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/share/] share directory 
 [Internal storage/xinhao/web_config/] web temporary directory 

version Tip: The session window is on the right side

Legal Notices:

" ZeroTermux is a non-profit software developed based on Termux

Part of the copyright belongs to ZeroTermux

No responsibility for any legal issues and risks, and no commercial purpose


 Do not use for illegal purposes! 
 
 Please abide by the law and be a good citizen,
 
 The original intention of ZeroTermux is to let you enter the linux world faster, contribute a spirit to the construction of society in the future, and make a contribution
 

After a certain level of use, it is strongly recommended that you transition to the official termux [start using after getting started] (recommended),
 

After all, ZT can help you for a while, but it can't help you for the rest of your life!
 

Note: [Delete function may empty your SD card] in the [Switch system] function
 
 Please turn off the sd card authorization to execute the [Delete] function
 
 If your operation (not limited to the [Delete Function] of [Switch System], here is all the functions of ZeroTermux), your SD card includes:
 
 Photo
 Video
 Audio
 As well as all other data, you (the personal user of ZeroTermux (ZT)) are responsible for yourself
 

The download source of the public warehouse is uncontrollable and is not under the control of ZeroTermux. It all comes from a third-party warehouse. ZeroTermux and the author will not be responsible for everything from the third-party warehouse!
 
 
 If the third-party warehouse has all illegal activities/documents, the author who provides the third-party warehouse bears any legal responsibility! ZeroTermux and the author do not bear any legal/other responsibilities!

 
 License:
 

All functions of ZeroTermux can only be used for personal learning and communication, not for commercial use! and illegal use!
 
 All functions of ZeroTermux can only be used for personal learning and communication, not for commercial use! and illegal use!

 All functions of ZeroTermux can only be used for personal learning and communication, not for commercial use! and illegal use!


1. This software (ZeroTermux) is open source software, you can freely distribute, copy, and change, but please follow the GPL agreement!

 2. The software follows the GPL agreement (http://www.opensource.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.php)

 3. All the functions of this software (ZeroTermux) are for learning and communication use, do not use commercially, such as accidental operations, intentional operations, unintentional operations, etc. of the user (users who use ZeroTermux) are borne by the user!
 4. This software (ZeroTermux) is used for free learning and communication as in the first regulation. The icons and fonts involved in the software are all from the Internet. 
 4.1. The font is the Android default font. If you use other fonts, please users (users using ZeroTermux) bear all risks and legal responsibilities. 
 4.2. The icon is used as the public library of Alibaba ICO. The principle of using the icon is for learning and communication, not for commercial use. If there is any infringement, it will be deleted immediately. 
 5. The recovery packages, data packages, zip packages, etc. used in this software (ZeroTermux) are all at risk. All of them are from the Internet. Please use it at your discretion. If any irreparable loss is caused, the user shall bear the risk. . 
 6. All recovery packages, data packages, and zip packages ZeroTermux cannot control their content. If there is any infringement in the package, the author of this software does not bear any responsibility, and the creator of the recovery package, data package, and zip package shall bear the responsibility (tar.gz backup function law statement). 
 7. Thanks to all the authors of the functions applied to this project. 
 8.Using ZeroTermux will directly or indirectly damage your equipment. If there is any irreparable loss, the user shall bear the responsibility of the software and the author.
"

 -drive file=fat:rw:/home/storage/shared/xinhao/share
 Place the interactive files with the virtual machine under the [internal storage/xinhao/share] directory
 To copy new files, you must restart the virtual machine to see the files!!
 To copy new files, you must restart the virtual machine to see the files!!
 Tip: If you need to share files (virtual machine interactive files), it has been added by default
 Please add before -vnc:
 -drive file=fat:rw:/sdcard/xinhao/share
 Command, long press to copy the command"

Terminal Margin Adjustment Terminal margin adjustment will be disabled. Terminal margin adjustment will be enabled. It should be enabled to try to fix the issue where soft keyboard covers part of extra keys/terminal view. If it causes screen flickering on your devices, then disable it. (Default)
